Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.physics.component.particle

Class ParticleAppearanceConfiguration

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.physics.component.particle.ParticleConfiguration
technology.sola.engine.physics.component.particle.ParticleAppearanceConfiguration
@NullMarked public class ParticleAppearanceConfiguration extends ParticleConfiguration
ParticleAppearanceConfiguration contains configuration for the appearance properties of emitted Particles.
